FuncDef:
The load-balance dynamic-adjust trunk enable command enables dynamic adjustment of trunk load balancing.
The undo load-balance dynamic-adjust trunk enable command disables dynamic adjustment of trunk load balancing.
By default, dynamic adjustment of trunk load balancing is disabled.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To address uneven trunk load balancing, run the load-balance dynamic-adjust trunk enable command to enable dynamic adjustment of trunk load balancing. This function allows dynamic adjustment of the load balancing results of all traffic, improving the hash precision of load balancing.
Precautions
This command applies only to the LPUF-50/LPUF-50-L/LPUI-21-L/LPUI-51-L/LPUF-51/LPUF-51-B/LPUI-51/LPUI-51-B/LPUI-51-S/LPUS-51/LPUF-101/LPUF-101-B/LPUI-101/LPUI-101-B/LPUS-101/LPUF-51-E/LPUI-51-E/LPUI-51-CM/LPUF-120/LPUF-120-B/LPUF-120-E/LPUI-102-E/LPUI-120/LPUI-120-B/LPUI-120-L/LPUI-52-E/LPUI-120-E/LPUI-120-CM/LPUF-240/LPUF-240-B/LPUF-240-E/LPUI-240/LPUI-240-B/LPUI-240-CM/LPUI-240-L/LPUF-480/LPUF-480-B/LPUI-480/LPUI-480-B/LPUI-480-L/LPUF-480-E/LPUI-480-CM/LPUI-200/LPUI-200-L/LPUF-200/LPUF-200-B/LPUI-1T/LPUI-1T-B/LPUI-1T-L/LPUI-1T-CM/LPUI-2T/LPUI-2T-B/LPUI-2T-CM/LPUF-481/LPUF-402-E/LPUI-241/LPUI-241-B/LPUI-241-CM//LPUF-241/LPUF-241-E/LPUF-52/LPUF-1T-E/LPUI-1T-CM/LPUF-1T-L.
The traffic adjusted based on dynamic trunk load balancing is based on boards, instead of the device. If the traffic is evenly balanced among boards, the traffic load balancing is even for the device. If traffic load balancing fails on a board due to heavy traffic or a adjustment failure, the traffic load balancing is uneven for the device.
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
